email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this message finds you well.

We are pleased to offer a freight rate for the shipment of 15,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Yokohama. Our initial quote is USD 42 per metric ton under CIF terms.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 75,000 and LOA of 225m. The laycan is 15-20 November. Please let us know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels. Could you consider lowering it to USD 38 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and laytime details?

Best,
Michael Jones
Charterer Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your response. Considering your feedback, we can revise the rate to USD 40 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, and the laytime is 72 hours.

Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

The revised rate of USD 40 per metric ton is acceptable. However, we would like to reduce the laytime to 48 hours if possible. Could you confirm if this adjustment is feasible?

Best,
Michael Jones
Charterer Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

We can accommodate a laytime of 48 hours. The demurrage rate will remain at USD 15,000 per day for any delays beyond this period.

Please confirm your acceptance, and we will proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

We confirm our acceptance of the terms. Please proceed with the shipment arrangements.

Best,
Michael Jones
Charterer Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers
